title: What is the main cause of pimples occurring on face of teenagers and what is it solutions? - Quora

response.answer_text: The location of the pimple can tell you lots. FOREHEAD StressOily FoodsHats and caps that cover the poresHeavy hair care products (conditioners, oil, hairspray)NOSE Expired makeupSpicy and Meaty FoodBROWS Food AllergyDehydrationCHEEKS Bad hygieneSmokingCHIN/JAWLINE Hormones*it is unavoidable but with good sleep, hygiene and lots of water, you can prevent breakouts* EARS DehydrationOver dosage of carbonated and caffeinated drinksSOLUTIONS: The natural remedy is good sleep, relaxed lifestyle, proper hydration and good hygiene. Besides this turmeric paste helps remove pimple marks and pimples. Aloe vera is another. Even rubbing sliced and raw potato can help. Lime is also a permanent and quick method.
